5J4.F.summary: Savosolar Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, designs and supplies solar thermal solutions in Europe. The company produces flat plate collectors, collector fields, and turnkey solar thermal systems. Its products are used in district heating, industrial process heating, and hot water and space heating applications. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Mikkeli, Finland.

ACG1V.HE.summary: Aspocomp Group Oyj manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) in Finland, Europe, and internationally. It offers high density interconnection, multilayer and backplane, high frequency, and mixed dielectric PCBs, as well as PCBs with cooling features and insulator metal substrate PCBs. The company's PCB's are used in various applications in automotive electronics, semiconductor industry, telecommunication infrastructure, and industrial electronics as well as security, and defense and aerospace sectors. It also provides related design and logistics services, and PCB trading services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

ADMCM.HE.summary: Admicom Oyj engages in the ERP management system development business in Finland. The company offers cloud based business management system solutions; accounting, payroll, and controller services; and training, and customer support services. It serves building engineers, and construction and industrial professionals. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in JyvÃ¤skylÃ¤, Finland.

BAS1V.HE.summary: Basware Oyj provides networked purchase-to-pay solutions, and e-invoicing and financing services in Finland and internationally. It offers analytics, travel and expense management, sourcing, and e-procurement solutions; and solutions for accounts receivable and payable. The company also provides financing services solutions, including Basware Discount, a solution that offers discount for early payment; and Basware Pay, a payment solution. It serves customers in healthcare, energy and utilities, public sector and non-profit, manufacturing, retail and leisure, construction, transport and logistics, finance and insurance, software and telecoms. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

BILOT.HE.summary: Bilot Oyj, a software and IT service company, develops and offers a range of digital services and solutions in Finland. It offers solutions in the areas of customer experience marketing, sales, commerce, and service; and data strategy and governance, data management, business intelligence and advanced analytics, artificial intelligence, and machine learning. The company also provides service design and user experience, business process, integration, and custom solutions. It serves process industry, manufacturing, wholesale, retail, services, consumer products and the food industry. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

BITTI.HE.summary: Bittium Oyj develops and offers solutions for connectivity, tactical communications, and biosignal measuring and monitoring worldwide. The company offers information security solutions for mobile devices and portable computers; and healthcare technology products and services for biosignal measuring in the areas of cardiology, neurophysiology, rehabilitation, occupational health, and sports medicine. It offers tactical communications solutions that cover IP networks, radio links, mobile ad-hoc networks, software defined radio based products and systems, waveforms, LTE solutions, and IP-based communication products; and secure communications and connectivity solutions comprising secure smartphones for professionals, certified secure mobile communications, LTE and dual-mode critical communications, customizable mobile platforms for enterprises, secure remote access for care workers, and always-on connectivity for field workers. The company also provides research and development services in the areas of system and architecture, electronics, mechanics, wireless, and software design, as well as testing and verification, digitalization, and certified systems for telecom, mobile devices, mobile satellite communications, semiconductors, healthcare and medical, industrial, and automotive markets. It operates in Finland, Germany, the United States, Mexico, and Singapore. The company was formerly known as Elektrobit Oyj and changed its name to Bittium Oyj in July 2015. Bittium Oyj was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Oulu, Finland.

BWV.F.summary: Basware Oyj provides networked purchase-to-pay solutions, and e-invoicing and financing services in Finland and internationally. It offers analytics, travel and expense management, sourcing, and e-procurement solutions; and solutions for accounts receivable and payable. The company also provides financing services solutions, including Basware Discount, a solution that offers discount for early payment; and Basware Pay, a payment solution. It serves customers in healthcare, energy and utilities, public sector and non-profit, manufacturing, retail and leisure, construction, transport and logistics, finance and insurance, software and telecoms. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

DETEC.HE.summary: Detection Technology Oyj provides X-ray detector solutions for medical, security, and industrial applications in approximately 40 countries. The company offers X-ray line detectors, detector cards, and flat panel detectors; X-ray detector components, such as arrays and preamplifier ASICs; backside and frontside illuminated photodiode arrays; electronics; mechanics; and software products. Its X-ray detectors are used in computed tomography, digital mammography, bone densitometry, chest X-ray, and other medical applications; and X-ray imaging subsystems are used in train, vehicle, container, air cargo, and baggage and parcel scanning, as well as portable and people scanning. The company's products are also used in the agriculture, defense and aerospace, forest, mining, pharmaceutical, renewable energy, automotive, food, industrial process control, oil and gas, and recycling and waste sorting industries. Detection Technology Oyj was founded in 1991 and is based in Espoo, Finland.

DIGIA.HE.summary: Digia Oyj provides software and services for organizations to develop services, manage business, and utilize data in Finland and internationally. The company offers service design and business consulting services; e-commerce solutions that designs and builds online stores; product information management services; applications and tailored mobile solutions; data and analytics solutions; integration and application programming interface solutions; and monitoring and service management solutions. It also provides enterprise resource planning (ERP) solutions comprising Digia Enterprise, an ERP system; financial solutions for fund management and asset management companies, and brokers; Microsoft Dynamics 365, an end-to-end business solution; Digia Logistics, an ERP system for logistics and forwarding companies; and customer relationship management (CRM) solutions. The company serves energy, banking and investment services, insurance, grocery, manufacturing, public sector, retail and wholesale, service business, social and healthcare services, and logistics industries, as well as trade unions and unemployment funds. Digia Oyj is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

DIGIGR.HE.summary: Digitalist Group Plc provides digital solutions in Europe and the North America. The company offers Ticknovate, a digital ticket booking solution; LeanLaban, an interactive platform that connects and forms community to its customers; and Digitalist Experience Store, a proprietary white label App store content platform. It also provides insight services, such as research and insight, user insight, business insight, industry insight, usability testing, heuristic evaluation, user testing, long-term usability study, leanlabtm, and digital performance; service and business, digital, and product and industrial design services; and technological solutions. The company was formerly known as Ixonos plc and changed its name to Digitalist Group Plc in May 2017. Digitalist Group Plc was incorporated in 1995 is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

DTV.F.summary: F-Secure Oyj provides cyber security products and services in Nordic countries, rest of Europe, North America, and internationally. Its corporate security solutions include F-Secure Radar, a vulnerability scanning and management platform; phishd, an anti-phishing behavior management platform; F-Secure Protection Service for Business, a cloud-hosted endpoint security; F-Secure Business Suite, an on-site deployed endpoint security; F-Secure Cloud Protection for Salesforce, a content level security for Salesforce's customers; F-Secure Rapid Detection and Response, a customer or partner-managed endpoint detection and response solution for detecting and responding to targeted attacks; F-Secure Rapid Detection and Response Service, a managed detection and response service; and Countercept, a threat hunting and continuous response capabilities against targeted attacks delivered as a managed service. The company also provides cyber security services comprising F-Secure cyber incident and resilience services, F-Secure security assessments, F-Secure red team testing, and F-Secure cyber risk management. In addition, it offers consumer security solutions, including F-Secure SAFE, an antivirus and Internet security solution; F-Secure KEY, a password manager; F-Secure FREEDOME, a VPN that hides online activity to ensure anonymous and secure Internet browsing; F-Secure SENSE, a security solution for connected home devices; F-Secure Internet Security for secure Internet surfing with browsing protection; and F-Secure Anti-Virus, a malware removal technology software. The company serves consumers and business customers through a network of approximately 200 telecommunications operators, as well as through thousands of IT service and retail partners. F-Secure Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

EFECTE.HE.summary: Efecte Oy, a software company, provides cloud-based software as a service and identity management solutions in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, and Germany. It offers contract, finance, and HR management solutions, as well as business and IT service management solutions. The company also provides training, support, and consultancy services. It serves large, mid-sized, and public organizations, as well as software business professionals. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

ENERS.ST.summary: Enersize Oyj provides online compressed air management software. It offers LEAQS, a leakage management software; Q+ online measurement and monitoring software; and Q+ automated real-time analysis & optimization software. The company provides its solutions for leakage management, measurement, data acquisition, and automated analysis of the compressed air systems operations based on IoT and cloud computing. The company is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

Its corporate security solutions include F-Secure Radar, a vulnerability scanning and management platform; phishd, an anti-phishing behavior management platform; F-Secure Protection Service for Business, a cloud-hosted endpoint security; F-Secure Business Suite, an on-site deployed endpoint security; F-Secure Cloud Protection for Salesforce, a content level security for Salesforce's customers; F-Secure Rapid Detection and Response, a customer or partner-managed endpoint detection and response solution for detecting and responding to targeted attacks; F-Secure Rapid Detection and Response Service, a managed detection and response service; and Countercept, a threat hunting and continuous response capabilities against targeted attacks delivered as a managed service. The company serves consumers and business customers through a network of approximately 200 telecommunications operators, as well as through thousands of IT service and retail partners. F-Secure Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

The company serves consumers and business customers through a network of approximately 200 telecommunications operators, as well as through thousands of IT service and retail partners. F-Secure Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

GOFORE.HE.summary: Gofore Oyj provides digitalisation consultancy services for private and public sector operators in Finland, Germany, Spain, and Estonia. The company engages in business design and transformation consulting; digital services design, build, and development; and maintenance and support partnership. It also engages in the management of digital change, service design, and software development, as well as provides cloud services utilisation and cloud capacity consulting services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tampere, Finland.

HEEROS.HE.summary: Heeros Oyj provides cloud-based financial management solutions. The company offers automated solutions for purchase invoice workflow, invoice OCR processing, e-invoicing, e-archiving, SEPA payments, payable and receivable ledgers, general ledger accounting, and mobile applications. It also provides implementation, training, and main user services. The company serves individual businesses and organizations, accounting firms, governments, and educational institutes. Heeros Oyj is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

ICP1V.HE.summary: Incap Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Europe, North-America, Asia, Africa, and Australia. The company offers PCB assembly and manufacturing, box-build assembly, and prototyping and engineering services, as well as tester development and magnetic assemblies. It also offers prototypes and pre-series. The company serves the suppliers of high-technology equipment. Incap Oyj was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

IFA1V.HE.summary: Innofactor Oyj provides digitalization and cloud solutions that focus on Microsoft platforms in the Nordic countries. It develops software products and services; and offers planning services for business-critical solutions, project deliveries, implementation support, and maintenance services. The company offers Dynasty 10, a software suite for information management processes; Innolog, a solution for monitoring of personal data files and log data management in the healthcare, and social services sectors; Membership Management System solution for customer relationship and operations management for trade unions and membership-based organizations; Prime, a solution that optimize and manage organizations resources; QualityFirst, a quality and management software suite; Skilli, a cloud-based learning analytics solution; and solutions for managing courses, events, and conferences. It also provides solutions in the areas of service design, websites and mobile apps, digital customer service and marketing automation, customer relationship management, enterprise resource planning, project and portfolio management, quality and management, case and document management, HR and talent management, digital collaboration and mobile work, cloud infrastructure, governance, security and GDPR, identity and access management, enterprise mobility and security, managed cloud services, advanced analytics and BI, and Internet of Things, as well as customized solutions. Innofactor Oyj was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

JOT.F.summary: Bittium Oyj develops and offers solutions for connectivity, tactical communications, and biosignal measuring and monitoring worldwide. The company offers information security solutions for mobile devices and portable computers; and healthcare technology products and services for biosignal measuring in the areas of cardiology, neurophysiology, rehabilitation, occupational health, and sports medicine. It offers tactical communications solutions that cover IP networks, radio links, mobile ad-hoc networks, software defined radio based products and systems, waveforms, LTE solutions, and IP-based communication products; and secure communications and connectivity solutions comprising secure smartphones for professionals, certified secure mobile communications, LTE and dual-mode critical communications, customizable mobile platforms for enterprises, secure remote access for care workers, and always-on connectivity for field workers. The company also provides research and development services in the areas of system and architecture, electronics, mechanics, wireless, and software design, as well as testing and verification, digitalization, and certified systems for telecom, mobile devices, mobile satellite communications, semiconductors, healthcare and medical, industrial, and automotive markets. It operates in Finland, Germany, the United States, Mexico, and Singapore. The company was formerly known as Elektrobit Oyj and changed its name to Bittium Oyj in July 2015. Bittium Oyj was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Oulu, Finland.

LEADD.HE.summary: LeadDesk Oy develops and supplies cloud based high-volume sales and customer-service software in the Nordic countries. The company offers software for outbound sales, inbound sales, customer services, and pricing. It serves customers in media, security service, energy, telecommunication, financial service, and market research industries. The company is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

NIXU.HE.summary: Nixu Oyj operates as a cybersecurity services company in Finland, Sweden, the Netherlands, Denmark, Belgium, the United Kingdom, and internationally. It offers services in the areas of business digitalization, cyber defense, cybersecurity outsourcing, cloud transformation, compliance and certification, and connected devices. The company provides services and sells licenses to business enterprises and the public sector. Nixu Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

NOA3.DE.summary: Nokia Corporation engages in the network and technology businesses worldwide. The company operates in four segments: Ultra Broadband Networks, Global Services, IP Networks and Applications, and Nokia Technologies. It focuses on mobile radio including macro radio, small cells, and cloud native radio solutions for communications service providers and enterprises; and provides network planning and optimization, network implementation, and systems integration, as well as company-wide managed services. The company also offers fixed networking solutions, such as copper and fiber access products, solutions, and services. In addition, it provides network infrastructure and professional services for mobile networks; and managed services for the fixed, mobile, Internet protocol (IP), and optical domains. Further, the company offers network planning, implementation, operation, and maintenance services. Additionally, it provides IP/optical networking solutions, including IP routing and optical transport systems, software, and services; software solutions, such as customer experience management, network operations and management, communications and collaborations, policy and charging, as well as Cloud, IoT, security, and analytics platforms; and submarine networks and radio frequency systems. The company has a strategic collaboration with Microsoft; and a collaboration with CommScope Holding Company, Inc. to develop an interleaved passive-active antenna radio platform. It also has a strategic 5G partnership with Zain KSA to rollout 60,000 FastMile 5G Gateway 3.1 with eSIM across Saudi Arabia. Nokia Corporation was founded in 1865 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

The company operates in four segments: Ultra Broadband Networks, Global Services, IP Networks and Applications, and Nokia Technologies. NXC.MU.summary: Nixu Oyj operates as a cybersecurity services company in Finland, Sweden, the Netherlands, Denmark, Belgium, the United Kingdom, and internationally. It offers services in the areas of business digitalization, cyber defense, cybersecurity outsourcing, cloud transformation, compliance and certification, and connected devices. The company provides services and sells licenses to business enterprises and the public sector. Nixu Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

QPR1V.HE.summary: QPR Software Oyj provides services and software tools for developing business processes and enterprise architecture in Finland and rest of Europe, Russia, Turkey, and internationally. It offers QPR ProcessAnalyzer, a process mining software; QPR EnterpriseArchitect, an enterprise architecture modeling software; and QPR Metrics, a performance management software product that automates strategy execution, operational performance management, people performance management, risk management, and project portfolio management. The company also provides QPR ProcessDesigner, a business process modeling tool to describe, analyze, communicate, and enhance processes; QPR Connectors that connects to various data sources and integrate data; and QPR Cloud, which offers solutions as a service for process mining, enterprise architecture, business process management, performance management, and quality management. QPR Software Oyj was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

QTCOM.HE.summary: Qt Group Oyj, a software company, develops, productizes, and licenses software development tools under commercial and open source licenses in Finland, Norway, Germany, the United States, Russia, Japan, China, South Korea, France, and the United Kingdom. The company offers a framework of libraries and tools for designing, developing, and deploying software. It also provides professional, consulting, training, and technical support services. The company is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

S0A.MU.summary: Scanfil Oyj operates as a contract manufacturer and system supplier for the electronics industry worldwide. The company provides product design, product manufacturing, material procurement and logistics solutions, as well as after-sales services, such as maintenance and spare parts services. It also offers video surveillance systems and equipment, communications network devices, audio communications products, health technology devices and systems, electricity and automation system modules, renewable energy production converters and inverters, frequency converters, elevator and forklift control systems, analyzers, lift control systems, analyzers, various slot and vending machines, defense industry devices, and meteorological instruments. The company serves customers in communication, consumer applications, energy and automation, industrial, and medtech and life science, as well as companies operating in fields related to urbanization. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Sievi, Finland.

SAVOH.HE.summary: Savosolar Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, designs and supplies solar thermal solutions in Europe. The company produces flat plate collectors, collector fields, and turnkey solar thermal systems. Its products are used in district heating, industrial process heating, and hot water and space heating applications. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Mikkeli, Finland.

SAVOS.ST.summary: Savosolar Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, designs and supplies solar thermal solutions in Europe. The company produces flat plate collectors, collector fields, and turnkey solar thermal systems. Its products are used in district heating, industrial process heating, and hot water and space heating applications. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Mikkeli, Finland.

SCANFL.HE.summary: Scanfil Oyj operates as a contract manufacturer and system supplier for the electronics industry worldwide. The company provides product design, product manufacturing, material procurement and logistics solutions, as well as after-sales services, such as maintenance and spare parts services. It also offers video surveillance systems and equipment, communications network devices, audio communications products, health technology devices and systems, electricity and automation system modules, renewable energy production converters and inverters, frequency converters, elevator and forklift control systems, analyzers, lift control systems, analyzers, various slot and vending machines, defense industry devices, and meteorological instruments. The company serves customers in communication, consumer applications, energy and automation, industrial, and medtech and life science, as well as companies operating in fields related to urbanization. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Sievi, Finland.

SIILI.HE.summary: Siili Solutions Oyj engages in the software integration and digital service businesses in Finland and internationally. The company offers strategy and consulting, experience design, engineering, data and intelligence, automation, and managed services. It also provides customized design and development services for the full lifecycle of digital services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

SOLTEQ.HE.summary: Solteq Oyj, an IT service and software company, provides digital business solutions in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Poland, and the United Kingdom. The company offers Solteq Cloud POS, a point-of sale (POS) solution for cafeteria, lunch restaurants, events, and self-service needs; Solteq Tekso, a cash register system for fashion and hardware shops, other specialty shops, and grocery retail; and Solteq Order Engine that is tailored to individual customer needs. It also provides Solteq Robotics for customized packages and continuous service; and Solteq Retail Robot, which moves inside a store to recognize products, empty or hole shelves, and incorrect price tags, as well as builds 3D maps of stores with product locations and integrates to the POS, PIM, planogram, and ERP systems. In addition, the company offers inPulse4Utilities that provides tools for digital customer engagement for district heating, water supply, and energy companies; inWorks, which offers browser-based customer data management and invoicing systems; Vehicle sales that provides solutions for vehicle retail sales and after-sales services; and Solteq Smart Dealer, which offers automotive and aftermarket products. Further, it provides Solteq WebService, a cloud-based ERP system for vehicle maintenance and after-sales services; Solteq Service Box that allows customers to deliver and return keys according to their own individual schedules; Trafi Âquery, a search portal for accessing up-to-date vehicle and customer information from the Trafi ATJ database; Customer Data Refreshment, which offers up to date customer data; Solteq Care, an electronic journal system, for municipality health care; and Solteq Tooth, a dental system for handling records and patient-oriented administrative tasks. The company was formerly known as Tampereen Tiedonhallinta. Solteq Oyj was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.

TEM1V.HE.summary: Tecnotree Oyj provides telecom IT solutions products and services for charging, billing, customer care, and messaging and content services in the, Europe and Americas, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia Pacific. The company's product portfolio comprises a range of business management solutions for digital service providers, as well as a range of order-to-cash of business process and subscription management for telecom and other digital service providers. Its solutions include Digital Commerce Suite, a marketplace to purchase and subscriber to owned and partnered offerings, Digital BSS Suite for enterprise business, VAS Consolidation services; and BSS Switch. The company also provides managed, maintenance and support, and consulting services. It enables its customers to monetize and transform their business into a marketplace of digital services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

TIETO.HE.summary: TietoEVRY Oyj operates as a software and services company. It operates through Digital Experience, Hybrid Infra, Industry Software, and Product Development Services segments. The Digital Experience segment provides consulting services, including design of service experiences, smart use of data, IT architecture consulting, and business process and change management, as well as system integration, and application development and management. The Hybrid Infra segment offers enterprises with life cycle management of IT infrastructure, which covers a variety of technologies. The Industry Software segment provides with industry-specific software products for business-critical processes of clients in the financial services, public and healthcare, and welfare sectors, as well as in the forest industry, and the energy and oil and gas segments. The Product Development Services segment offers software R&D services with a focus on the telecom sector, as well as new domains, such as automotive serving the communications infrastructure, consumer electronics, and semiconductor companies, and the automotive industry. The company also provides software advisory and consulting services, and industry specific software; engages in the design, implementation, and maintenance of customized solutions and IT operations. It operates in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Austria, the Baltic countries, Russia, and internationally. TietoEVRY has collaboration with VTT to bring European cybersecurity and research expertise to automotive software development. The company was formerly known as Tieto Oyj and changed its name to TietoEVRY Oyj in December 2019. TietoEVRY Oyj was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

TIETO.OL.summary: TietoEVRY Oyj operates as a software and services company. It operates through Digital Experience, Hybrid Infra, Industry Software, and Product Development Services segments. The Digital Experience segment provides consulting services, including design of service experiences, smart use of data, IT architecture consulting, and business process and change management, as well as system integration, and application development and management. The Hybrid Infra segment offers enterprises with life cycle management of IT infrastructure, which covers a variety of technologies. The Industry Software segment provides with industry-specific software products for business-critical processes of clients in the financial services, public and healthcare, and welfare sectors, as well as in the forest industry, and the energy and oil and gas segments. The Product Development Services segment offers software R&D services with a focus on the telecom sector, as well as new domains, such as automotive serving the communications infrastructure, consumer electronics, and semiconductor companies, and the automotive industry. The company also provides software advisory and consulting services, and industry specific software; engages in the design, implementation, and maintenance of customized solutions and IT operations. It operates in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Austria, the Baltic countries, Russia, and internationally. TietoEVRY has collaboration with VTT to bring European cybersecurity and research expertise to automotive software development. The company was formerly known as Tieto Oyj and changed its name to TietoEVRY Oyj in December 2019. TietoEVRY Oyj was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

TIETOS.ST.summary: TietoEVRY Oyj operates as a software and services company. It operates through Digital Experience, Hybrid Infra, Industry Software, and Product Development Services segments. The Digital Experience segment provides consulting services, including design of service experiences, smart use of data, IT architecture consulting, and business process and change management, as well as system integration, and application development and management. The Hybrid Infra segment offers enterprises with life cycle management of IT infrastructure, which covers a variety of technologies. The Industry Software segment provides with industry-specific software products for business-critical processes of clients in the financial services, public and healthcare, and welfare sectors, as well as in the forest industry, and the energy and oil and gas segments. The Product Development Services segment offers software R&D services with a focus on the telecom sector, as well as new domains, such as automotive serving the communications infrastructure, consumer electronics, and semiconductor companies, and the automotive industry. The company also provides software advisory and consulting services, and industry specific software; engages in the design, implementation, and maintenance of customized solutions and IT operations. It operates in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Austria, the Baltic countries, Russia, and internationally. TietoEVRY has collaboration with VTT to bring European cybersecurity and research expertise to automotive software development. The company was formerly known as Tieto Oyj and changed its name to TietoEVRY Oyj in December 2019. TietoEVRY Oyj was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

TJG.F.summary: Innofactor Oyj provides digitalization and cloud solutions that focus on Microsoft platforms in the Nordic countries. It develops software products and services; and offers planning services for business-critical solutions, project deliveries, implementation support, and maintenance services. The company offers Dynasty 10, a software suite for information management processes; Innolog, a solution for monitoring of personal data files and log data management in the healthcare, and social services sectors; Membership Management System solution for customer relationship and operations management for trade unions and membership-based organizations; Prime, a solution that optimize and manage organizations resources; QualityFirst, a quality and management software suite; Skilli, a cloud-based learning analytics solution; and solutions for managing courses, events, and conferences. It also provides solutions in the areas of service design, websites and mobile apps, digital customer service and marketing automation, customer relationship management, enterprise resource planning, project and portfolio management, quality and management, case and document management, HR and talent management, digital collaboration and mobile work, cloud infrastructure, governance, security and GDPR, identity and access management, enterprise mobility and security, managed cloud services, advanced analytics and BI, and Internet of Things, as well as customized solutions. Innofactor Oyj was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

TLT1V.HE.summary: Teleste Corporation provides video and broadband solutions, and network services in Finland and internationally. The company's Video and Broadband Solutions segment focuses on product solutions for broadband access networks, video service platforms, and video surveillance applications. Its Network Services segment offers network service solutions, including new construction, rebuilding, upgrading, planning, and maintenance services for cable networks. The company's broadband data and video products include RF amplifiers, optical nodes, remote PHY nodes, RF passives, optical passives, management tools, DOCSIS mini-CMTS, headend optics, Luminato video headend products, and Optimo transcoders, as well as modular IP to analog TV and IP to FM radio converters. Its information and security products consist of passenger information management products, media content management products, fleet monitoring and operation control products, information displays, display control products, onboard passenger information systems, onboard infotainment and advertising products, onboard public address and intercommunications products, onboard video surveillance products, onboard connectivity products, video management systems, mobile network video recorders, fiber optic video transmission products, video encoders and decoders, secured IP link products, and S-AWARE situational awareness systems. In addition, the company provides information and security services, such as technical integration, software support and maintenance, system design, software integration and tailor made solutions, project management, configuration, installation and commissioning, and training; and broadband data and video services. It serves the hospitality, public transport, public authorities, airports, road, and military and border control markets, as well as installers, operators, and wholesalers and distributors. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Littoinen, Finland.

TTEB.F.summary: TietoEVRY Oyj operates as a software and services company. It operates through Digital Experience, Hybrid Infra, Industry Software, and Product Development Services segments. The Digital Experience segment provides consulting services, including design of service experiences, smart use of data, IT architecture consulting, and business process and change management, as well as system integration, and application development and management. The Hybrid Infra segment offers enterprises with life cycle management of IT infrastructure, which covers a variety of technologies. The Industry Software segment provides with industry-specific software products for business-critical processes of clients in the financial services, public and healthcare, and welfare sectors, as well as in the forest industry, and the energy and oil and gas segments. The Product Development Services segment offers software R&D services with a focus on the telecom sector, as well as new domains, such as automotive serving the communications infrastructure, consumer electronics, and semiconductor companies, and the automotive industry. The company also provides software advisory and consulting services, and industry specific software; engages in the design, implementation, and maintenance of customized solutions and IT operations. It operates in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Austria, the Baltic countries, Russia, and internationally. TietoEVRY has collaboration with VTT to bring European cybersecurity and research expertise to automotive software development. The company was formerly known as Tieto Oyj and changed its name to TietoEVRY Oyj in December 2019. TietoEVRY Oyj was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

VAIAS.HE.summary: Vaisala Oyj engages in the weather and environmental, and industrial measurement business serving weather related and industrial markets. The company's products include industrial measurement systems, such as indoor measurement and process control instruments, continuous monitoring systems, instruments for power transformers, and technology for liquid concentration measurement; and weather and environmental solutions comprising sensors and instruments, systems and solutions, and digital and data as a service products. It also offers technical support, calibration and repair, system maintenance, consulting, training, project, modernization, and continuous monitoring system services, as well as online stores. The company serves weather-dependent markets, such as meteorology, ground transportation, aviation, railway, maritime, safety and security, renewable energy, and ambient air quality; and various industrial customers includes life science and power industry. It has operations Europe, the Middle East, Africa, North and South Americas, and the Asia Pacific. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.

VALOE.HE.summary: Valoe Oyj develops and sells solar energy technology products worldwide. The company offers automated production technology for solar modules; production lines for modules, solar modules, and special components for solar modules; and solar cells. It also provides one-sided interdigitated back contact (IBC) and bifacial IBC back contact modules; and solar power plants and systems. The company was formerly known as Cencorp Oyj and changed its name to Valoe Oyj in May 2015. Valoe Oyj was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Mikkeli, Finland.

VAYA.F.summary: Vaisala Oyj engages in the weather and environmental, and industrial measurement business serving weather related and industrial markets. The company's products include industrial measurement systems, such as indoor measurement and process control instruments, continuous monitoring systems, instruments for power transformers, and technology for liquid concentration measurement; and weather and environmental solutions comprising sensors and instruments, systems and solutions, and digital and data as a service products. It also offers technical support, calibration and repair, system maintenance, consulting, training, project, modernization, and continuous monitoring system services, as well as online stores. The company serves weather-dependent markets, such as meteorology, ground transportation, aviation, railway, maritime, safety and security, renewable energy, and ambient air quality; and various industrial customers includes life science and power industry. It has operations Europe, the Middle East, Africa, North and South Americas, and the Asia Pacific. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.
